MajorClaims.Text: I myself agree with the plan to build the university
the benefit from it will outweigh the cost
I will be happy to hear that the government has a plan to build a new university in my community

Claims.Text: There are many advantages setting up the university such as more opportunities to people in the community to pursue their studies, creation of jobs
This new university will allow a great number of people in my community to have a chance to study
This can also help stimulate the local economy
building the university may lead to some social problems

Premises.Text: suppose you live in a faraway community where there is no single university and you might not want to leave your family
If you would like to attend a business school, you have to travel across the country to get to a distant university
He or she definitely can get in the business school in the proposed community's university
a number vacant positions need to be filled
the university will have to hire professors, employees and etc
there will be more opportunities to work in the community
when people have jobs, they will have money to spend on goods and services
A number of people then may come from any other communities in order to get in to or get the jobs at the university
When many people congregate in one place, I think that some kinds of social problems will follow
More wastes have to be managed
Maybe crime rate will also increase
These social problems may impair the quality of life in the community
